h1_38: University of Southern California/LAC+USC Medical Center Program
h3_39: University of Southern California/LAC+USC Medical Center
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_97: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_100: We recruit and train residents to share in our Department's mission to improve the lives of patients with skin diseases through integration of patient care, education and research. The program provides clinical training through hands-on exposure to large, diverse patient populations including serving the skin care needs of our underserved population at our primary training site: LAC+USC Medical Center. Residents also rotate at the VA, Keck Hospital and Childrens' Hospital Los Angeles.
